column1: Here we go! Robert #Habeck and @ABaerbock welcome the around 800 participants to the #principle convention in Berlin! Now in the livestream: http://www.gruene.de # Prinzip2020
Immediately in the #Livestream: The Green #principles convention including @ABaerbock, Robert #Habeck, @MiKellner, @FerdaAtaman, @lyssaslounge and @Luisamneubauer: http://www.gruene.de # Prinzip2020

The Green #Principles Convention takes place in Berlin at the weekend. In his new blog "Opening up is the strength", Robert #Habeck writes about how we want to give orientation with our new basic program and keep society together: https://www.robert-habeck.de/texte/blog/sich-oeffnen -is-the-strong‚Ä¶

To date, women in Germany statistically work for lukewarm. Because in Germany they still earn significantly less than men. That needs to change! We want the same wages for the same work - so that the #EqualPayDay will be on January 1st! pic.twitter.com/DOYObhmqrC
Dear @FridayForFuture, we are fully behind you! Because there is no planet B! #FridaysForFuture pic.twitter.com/9KocmiqlfH

For a strong feminist society, @ABaerbock, @Gesine_Agena & thousands of others attended the #World Women's Day demo. We want women to earn the same as men. We stand against sexism & violence. Women should be allowed to determine their own bodies pic.twitter.com/pQUXKuNGhQ
